column4: Hi there, I deleted some default packages from my Ubuntu system and i want to revert it so that it doesn't lack any default packages.. any trick how to reinstall missing base (default) packages ?
if you have ubuntu-desktop installed, you should be set
if you create a fresh new user, does everything look ok?
i just deleted that package, it's not there.. i think it doesn't belong to ubuntu-desktop set but i'll take a look at apt logs now
